explains: v. 相交，交叉；横穿，横断；（与……）有交叉特征，（与……）相关联

sentences.en: The lines intersect at right angles.
In particularly wet years, short stretches of an otherwise dry stream-bed may have flowing water because the water table rises to intersect the land surface.
sentences.cn: 在气候特别湿润的年月里，平常干涸的河床下游可能会有水流动，因为地下水在那里位抬升到了地表以上。

sentences.en: If the water table intersect the land surface, groundwater will flow out onto the surface at springs, whether to be collected there or to subsequently flow farther along a drainage.
sentences.cn: 如果地下水位与地表相交，地下水将在泉水处流出地表，聚集于此或是随后沿着排水系统进一步流动。
